thread.title: Silver Lake to Buy Majority Stake in Weld North Education From KKR

author: Colin Kellaher
title: Silver Lake to Buy Majority Stake in Weld North Education From KKR

organizations.name: buy majority stake in weld north education from kkr

text:
Private-equity firm Silver Lake on Thursday said it agreed to buy a majority stake in online-education company Weld North Education from KKR & Co.
Financial terms of the deal werenâ€™t disclosed.
